member.name: TsGravity
member.summary: Elements of the TsGravity enumeration specify the gravity type associated with an object.

member.name: TsGravity.TS_GR_BACKWARD
member.summary: The anchor has backward gravity. For more information about anchor gravity, see Ranges.

member.name: TsGravity.TS_GR_FORWARD
member.summary: The anchor has forward gravity. For more information about anchor gravity, see Ranges.
